page.title: 12Education, Ashford Carbonell
page.content: school building as their classroom, while the 16 Infants use a demountable building.6 children attend school on a part-time basis-one day a week-until they are 4yrs.8mths. old,when they begin schooling full-time.The school has a school house attached which is at present empty.In the past the Headteacher,and later the caretaker, occupied this house.There is a small playground and garden which the school children use at playtime.The climbing frame and slide are popular with all ages of children,while the sand pit is a favourite during the summer.Hanging on the school wall in the playground is the original school bell,which used to be housed in the bell tower.The bell is not used to-day very often.
